lead_paragraph: “At this point, release of the tax returns would be a vengeance victory at best and toothless evidence at worst,” one reader says.
snippet: “At this point, release of the tax returns would be a vengeance victory at best and toothless evidence at worst,” one reader says....

headline.main: The Continuing Kerfuffle Over Trump’s Tax Returns
headline.print_headline: The Kerfuffle Over the President’s Tax Returns
